articles.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) on Wednesday recommended against using generic anti-parasite drug ivermectin in patients with COVID-19 except for clinical trials, because of a lack of data demonstrating its benefits.
articles.title: WHO joins Europe, Merck in recommending against ivermectin for COVID-19 - ABS-CBN News
